metadata.description:
In the kick-off of the third series, Courtney returns to the city to visit her
best friend. But while Courtney's life has improved, her childhood
companion has changed for the worse. He's hanging out with a dodgy
crowd, and something awful has been lurking around his home. Courtney
can try to improve matters, but can things broken ever really be mended?
metadata.name: Courtney Crumrin In The Twilight Kingdom
